name: Minecraft: Java Editon
description:
New launcher iteration which runs as a native application that no longer bundles Java and have a brand new interface.

https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/5opl31/help_us_test_the_new_minecraft_launcher_now_with/
notes:
Currently requires newer versions of glibc (16.10 Ubuntu, for example)
Requires package libgconf-2-4 (On Ubuntu 16.04+)
content:
exe: minecraft-launcher
files:
- tarball: https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.tar.gz
game:
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    file: tarball
require-binaries: java
system:
  disable_runtime: true
